props.name: src
props.description: The source of the avatar image. Either a url or image-data with a url nested inside

props.name: alt
props.description: Provide alt text when the avatar is used without a name next to it.

props.name: size
props.type: number | { narrow?: number; regular?: number; wide?: number; }
props.description: The size of the avatar in pixels.

props.name: square
props.description: If true, the avatar will be square instead of circular.
